dialogue: I like Charles Dickens writing style; could you recommend a book by him?
Sure! You might like he Posthumous Papers of the Pickwick Club, The Old Curiosity Shop, or The Life and Adventures of Martin Chuzzlewit.
Wow, all those titles sound intriguing! Could you tell me more about the Posthumous Papers?

The Posthumous Papers of the Pickwick Club was Charles Dickens's first novel. He was asked to contribute to the project as an up-and-coming writer following the success of Sketches by Boz, published in 1836.
That is fascinating!  Do you know how many books he wrote in his lifetime?
He's written at least 19 amazing books!
That's a lot of books! Thanks for your help and input today.  I will add these to my reading list.
Enjoy!
wiki: Charles Dickens wrote The Old Curiosity Shop

dialogue: I heard that Becca Fitzpatrick writings was on the New York best selling list. Do you have any information on what she wrote?
She is a very talented writer. You might want to try one of these books she wrote: Silence or Hush, Hush. Both are wonderful.
That sounds interesting, was it recently released, and did it go to film?
It did go to film. The book was released in 2012.
Cool. I like drama, is that the genre catagory, it's in? I wonder if there are any other books or movies you can recommend.
Yes, it is considered a drama. One of my favorite drama's is Where the Heart is. Have you read it or seen the movie?
No I haven't read it or saw the movie. I will check it out. Thanks for the recommendation.
You bet. I hope you enjoy it.

Colorectal cancer if I remember right. Horrible disease.
Oh, how awful. It has taken so many lives...  That's what Ted Hughes, the author of The Iron Giant, also passed from.

It was released in 1996, and it is in English language and it is a  series of events that followed the Rapture, in which Jesus Christ takes away members of his church from Earth, some find themselves left behind. Eventually they meet at New Hope Village Church, located in the suburbs of Chicago. They then meet from time to time and become immersed in study of prophecies contained in the Bible. Their study reveals that the Antichrist will establish control of the Earth, and the Tribulation period lasting seven years will start after his covenant with Israel. Jesus Christ's second coming will fall on the end of the Tribulation.
